Name: NuclearRifle
About the game: 《NuclearRifle》 is an FPS shooting game. The protagonist wakes up from a small town house, only to find that the doors are locked. From time to time, strange sounds of biting came from nearby houses, and the exit of the town were sealed. What happened to the town? Can the protagonist escape? Game features Powerful physical damage effect A tense fight Simulate real ballistics Minor puzzles The most important There's a gun that doesn't have to be reloaded
